TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDesignerOptionService

summary.span: 提供对设计器选项的访问；在 Visual Studio 开发环境中，设计器选项位于“选项”命令下的“工具”菜单上。

span.span: Provides access to the designer options located on the **Tools** menu under the **Options** command in the Visual Studio development environment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供可用于检索和更新的情况下显示的对话框中列出的 Windows 窗体设计器选项的值的接口**选项**命令**工具**菜单Visual Studio 开发环境。 provides an interface that can be used to retrieve and update the values of the Windows Forms Designer options, which are listed within the dialog displayed by the **Options** command of the **Tools** menu of the Visual Studio development environment. 方法检索指定的选项的值。The method retrieves the value of a specified option. 方法设置为指定的选项指定的值。The method sets a specified value for a specified option. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问若要显示标准的选项的当前值。The following code example demonstrates accessing the to display the current values of the standard options. [!code-cpp[IDesignerOptionServiceExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IDesignerOptionServiceExample/CPP/idesigneroptionservicecontrol.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IDesignerOptionServiceExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IDesignerOptionServiceExample/CS/idesigneroptionservicecontrol.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IDesignerOptionServiceExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IDesignerOptionServiceExample/VB/idesigneroptionservicecontrol.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public object GetOptionValue (string pageName, string valueName);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object GetOptionValue(string pageName, string valueName) cil managed
Public Function GetOptionValue (pageName As String, valueName As String) As Object
public: System::Object ^ GetOptionValue(System::String ^ pageName, System::String ^ valueName);
abstract member GetOptionValue : string * string -> obj

param.name: pageName
param.span: 定义该选项的页的名称。

span.span: The name of the page that defines the option.
The name of the option property.

summary.span: 获取指定的 Windows 窗体设计器选项的值。

span.span: Gets the value of the specified Windows Forms Designer option.
The value of the specified option.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `pageName`参数应包含"WindowsFormsDesigner\\*CategoryName*"，其中*CategoryName*是没有任何空白字符的选项类别名称。The `pageName` parameter should consist of "WindowsFormsDesigner\\*CategoryName*", where *CategoryName* is an options category name without any white space characters. 通常的"常规"类别名称。The category name is typically "General". 因此，您可以访问英语页面名称"WindowsFormsDesigner\General"的"常规"设计器的选项类别。Therefore, you can access the "General" designer options category with the English page name "WindowsFormsDesigner\General". > [!NOTE] > 始终应在英语中的页和值名称。The page and value names are always expected in English. 因此，提供下表来帮助您访问所需的选项。Therefore, the following table is provided to help you access the options you want. 下表指示英语值名称、 其数据格式，以及每个的说明：The following table indicates the English value names, their data format, and a description of each: |值名称Value Name|值格式Value Format|描述Description| |----------------|------------------|-----------------| |GridSizeGridSize||每个网格方块的大小。The size of each grid square.| |GridSize.WidthGridSize.Width||每个网格方形的宽度。The width of each grid square. 此嵌套的属性为只读时通过设计器选项服务访问。This nested property is read-only when accessed through the designer option service.| |GridSize.HeightGridSize.Height||每个网格方形的高度。The height of each grid square. 此嵌套的属性为只读时通过设计器选项服务访问。This nested property is read-only when accessed through the designer option service.| |ShowGridShowGrid||`true` 如果应显示网格;`false`是否不应显示网格。`true` if the grid should be shown; `false` if the grid should not be shown.| |SnapToGridSnapToGrid||`true` 如果组件的位置应对齐到网格;`false`如果位置不一定是对齐应。`true` if the positions of the components should be aligned to the grid; `false` if the positions should not necessarily be aligned.| |LayoutModeLayoutMode|`Microsoft.VisualStudio.Windows.Forms.LayoutMode`|`SnapLines` 若要使用对齐线，或`SnapToGrid`对齐到网格中，控件`SnapLines` to use snaplines, or `SnapToGrid` to align controls to the grid,| |ObjectBoundSmartTagAutoShowObjectBoundSmartTagAutoShow||如果允许组件的智能标记面板在创建时自动打开，则为 `true`；否则为 `false`。`true` to allow a component's smart tag panel to open automatically upon creation; otherwise, `false`.| |AutoToolboxPopulateAutoToolboxPopulate||`true` 若要自动添加解决方案的自定义控件和组件**工具箱**; 否则为`false`。`true` to automatically add a solution's custom controls and components to the **Toolbox**; otherwise, `false`.| |UseOptimizedCodeGenerationUseOptimizedCodeGeneration||如果启用组件缓存，则为 `true`；否则为 `false`。`true` if the component cache is enabled; otherwise, `false`.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何使用方法的值查询`GridSize`选项。The following code example demonstrates using the method to query for the value of the `GridSize` option. [!code-cpp[IDesignerOptionServiceExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IDesignerOptionServiceExample/CPP/idesigneroptionservicecontrol.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[IDesignerOptionServiceExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IDesignerOptionServiceExample/CS/idesigneroptionservicecontrol.cs#2)] [!code-vb[IDesignerOptionServiceExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IDesignerOptionServiceExample/VB/idesigneroptionservicecontrol.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetOptionValue (string pageName, string valueName, object value);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetOptionValue(string pageName, string valueName, object value) cil managed
Public Sub SetOptionValue (pageName As String, valueName As String, value As Object)
public: void SetOptionValue(System::String ^ pageName, System::String ^ valueName, System::Object ^ value);
abstract member SetOptionValue : string * string * obj -> unit

param.name: pageName
param.span: 定义该选项的页的名称。

span.span: The name of the page that defines the option.
The name of the option property.

summary.span: 设置指定的 Windows 窗体设计器选项的值。

span.span: Sets the value of the specified Windows Forms Designer option.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `pageName`参数应包含"WindowsFormsDesigner\\*CategoryName*"，其中*CategoryName*是没有任何空白字符的选项类别名称。The `pageName` parameter should consist of "WindowsFormsDesigner\\*CategoryName*", where *CategoryName* is an options category name without any white space characters. 通常的"常规"类别名称。The category name is typically "General". 因此，您可以访问英语页面名称"WindowsFormsDesigner\General"的"常规"设计器的选项类别。Therefore, you can access the "General" designer options category with the English page name "WindowsFormsDesigner\General". > [!NOTE] > 始终应在英语中的页和值名称。The page and value names are always expected in English. 因此，提供下表来帮助您访问所需的选项。Therefore, the following table is provided to help you access the options you want. 下表指示英语值名称、 其数据格式，以及每个的说明：The following table indicates the English value names, their data format, and a description of each: |值名称Value Name|值格式Value Format|描述Description| |----------------|------------------|-----------------| |GridSizeGridSize||每个网格方块的大小。The size of each grid square.| |GridSize.WidthGridSize.Width||每个网格方形的宽度。The width of each grid square. 此嵌套的属性为只读时通过设计器选项服务访问。This nested property is read-only when accessed through the designer option service.| |GridSize.HeightGridSize.Height||每个网格方形的高度。The height of each grid square. 此嵌套的属性为只读时通过设计器选项服务访问。This nested property is read-only when accessed through the designer option service.| |ShowGridShowGrid||`true` 如果应显示网格;`false`是否不应显示网格。`true` if the grid should be shown; `false` if the grid should not be shown.| |SnapToGridSnapToGrid||`true` 如果组件的位置应对齐到网格;`false`如果位置不一定是对齐应。`true` if the positions of the components should be aligned to the grid; `false` if the positions should not necessarily be aligned.| |LayoutModeLayoutMode|`Microsoft.VisualStudio.Windows.Forms.LayoutMode`|`SnapLines` 若要使用对齐线，或`SnapToGrid`对齐到网格中，控件`SnapLines` to use snaplines, or `SnapToGrid` to align controls to the grid,| |ObjectBoundSmartTagAutoShowObjectBoundSmartTagAutoShow||如果允许组件的智能标记面板在创建时自动打开，则为 `true`；否则为 `false`。`true` to allow a component's smart tag panel to open automatically upon creation; otherwise, `false`.| |AutoToolboxPopulateAutoToolboxPopulate||`true` 若要自动添加解决方案的自定义控件和组件**工具箱**; 否则为`false`。`true` to automatically add a solution's custom controls and components to the **Toolbox**; otherwise, `false`.| |UseOptimizedCodeGenerationUseOptimizedCodeGeneration||如果启用组件缓存，则为 `true`；否则为 `false`。`true` if the component cache is enabled; otherwise, `false`.|
